entry.title: microsoft/microsoft-ui-xaml - Releases - 2024-07-03
entry.content:
WinUI 3 in WinAppSDK 1.6-experimental2

The source code for the version of WinUI 3 in the WinAppSDK 1.6-experimental2 is available. 1.6-experimental2 is an experimental release for the WinAppSDK that includes bug fixes for 1.5, access to non-stable APIs, and new features including updated Edge WebView2 SDK integration, new package deployment APIs, source searching in the microsoft-ui-xaml repo, and new extensions for Widget Providers.

Check out our release notes for the list of fixed issues and new or experimental APIs in this release.

Download the NuGet package for 1.6-experimental2 here: https://www.nuget.org/packages/Microsoft.WindowsAppSDK/1.6.240701003-experimental2.
